title: They're Not Only '60s Songwriting Superstars, But They're Also Married
teaser: Barry Mann and Cynthia Weil, who wrote "We Gotta Get Out of this Place," have been a team for more than 50 years. Terry Gross spoke with them in 2000, when they were depicted in the musical Beautiful.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
